overview:
Karin has been with Shelter since 2000 and brings twelve years of financial and accounting experience. Prior to joining Shelter, Karin spent over five years at public accounting firm, PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, most recently as a manager in the tax department where her clients were predominantly entertainment and start up internet companies.

Karin earned a Master in Professional Accounting from The University of Texas at Austin and a Bachelor of Arts in Communication Studies with an emphasis in Business and Administration from UCLA. Karin is also a licensed Certified Public Accountant.
